name: Child's Play (Day 65 Build - 8/24) (Beta)
description:
NOTICE! Save file does not save/load on iOS devices. This is due to the hardware, and is not a bug. To save your progress, use an Android or PC/laptop.

ALSO NOTICE! The game will be released as a mobile app eventually. At the moment, it technically supports mobile through HTML5, but older phones will be very laggy.

If save file isn't working, click the trash icon on the main menu to reset it.

Game Design Document: (all the information you would need about the project)

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gbhvy9C1JBnWD9svaj0gRtpjs_Bbk5k2_5W4UO-HWvE/...
